column3:
â€œRemarkable strain, even amid the current proliferation of varried genetics; the first I've felt compelled to review and rate a 5.

As sampled 10/2014:

The flavor is at once familiar, owing to a very sweet and clean skunk flavor, and unique in the interplay with the chem twist. The resin production is heavy, sparkling; flowers a medium-heavy overall density; impressive for the strong sativa presentation in character....â€

â€œA very uplifting strain from my experience. I felt very positive and happy but very lazy while medicated. I am naturally a low key, introspective person and I definitely felt more social as well. I totally recommend The Truth.â€

â€œI used to smoke quite a bit, and over the last year I have been on a tolerance break of my own choice. This is one of the first strains I had that I wasn't already used to. The onset is quick, not more than 4 or 5 minutes for me, and each hit I took was definitely noticeable. Flavor is superb and smooth. The high itself was extremely interesting for me. As I was coming up noises were very pronounced and while I was w...â€

â€œCan you handle the truth? Yes you can and you will have a really good time doing so! The Truth is listed as a hybrid and It has been my favorite hybrid for awhile now, some things take its place from time to time but I always come back to the truth. THC is shown as 19.5% but it still hits me nicely even when my tolerance is high. 

The effect on this is what I like to call a do stuff high." I smoke it and I want to ...â€"

â€œI was told by the staff of 14er Holistics that The T.R.U.T.H. is a landrace strain from Jamaica brought in through Colombia. Rumor has it.
 
I found the Truth to be a light, mellow, relaxing, and focusing strain that added brightness and a calm euphoria to my day and activities. As someone with anxiety and emotional imbalances, I found it to be a vital medicinal to feel normal" and active in my day. I feel very rela...â€"

â€œI have stage four cancer of the liver and colon. It causes so much pain in my back and legs. Also Iâ€™m going through kemo treatments. In which causes non stop vomiting. But when smoke this stain itâ€™s bring me great relief.â€
â€œHands down a GREAT strain. It kept me very concentrated and focus, but really mellowed the body and calmed my worries.â€
â€œI got the shatter/sugar version of a Sour cross of this strain and I love it for a good day time dab or maybe with some tea. Strong and sweet skunk taste. Almost like diesel fuel but too earthy.â€
â€œI got the shatter/sugar version of a Sour cross of this strain and I love it for a good day time dab or maybe with some tea. Strong and sweet skunk taste. Almost like diesel fuel but too earthy.â€

â€œThis strain is a perfect roller coaster of a ride. I decide to try this for back pain and I'm glad I did! First you get a burst of uplifting energy, and it follows up with a very uplifting and happy feeling! After about an hour it starts to mellow and the body starts to go numb and heavy and the pain melts away. I found myself sitting in the recliner watching TV and not even focusing on the pain! I could see where yo...â€
â€œIt smells beautiful in the grinder, and is a really kind bud.  Just got some and I am looking forward to exploring this strain further.â€
â€œLove this strain. It is The Truth. It makes me happy and euphoric but I can also get a deep sleep out of this one. Plus the flower is a gorgeous purple and it's super skunky.â€

â€œJust got this strain in Asheville. Definitely a good one.
Works wonders for head and backache.â€

â€œgood strain f/ everyday smoking or wake and bake.nice chunky,earthy and spicy smelling nugs.good on pain and anxiety and on some people will put u to sleep.everyone is different.good taste,nice and spicy.â€
â€œstraight fireâ€
â€œJust want to let everyone know, this is not the same strain as T.R.U.T.H. From 14er in Boulder, CO. Great strain but not the same.â€
â€œThe one I have is The Truth Sungrown. I really like it. It's indica but I don't feel tired at all, just relaxed with a mild elevated mood. Smells great.â€
â€œTastyâ€

â€œIntense earthy piney skunky smell, especially when ground up. Reminds me a of lemon skunk with added pine. Gives a big headrush and then leaves you pretty focused and clear headed. Pretty balanced overall. Good strain for a potency while still be functional.â€
â€œstraight fireâ€
â€œI'm not sure if I just got a bad crop but the truth was a big lie.  All I got was a headacheâ€

â€œâ€¢ Tried last night before bed bc I needed a powerful painkiller + muscle relaxer â€”> The Truth (of the matter) finally knocked-out a headache that Advil didn't touch all day & back spasms that limited my productivity.. all the while combating the anxiety + stresses incurred from all of it â€¢ ğŸ’£â€

â€œTruth is a good strain, a little sleepy head to it, but very nice body high.â€
â€œI really liked this strain. Only issue I have is there's seeds in it. I don't like seeds in trees. Tastes bad. But now that I have the seeds I'll put my spin on it.â€
â€œtasted great on both inhale and exhale, smells piney and fruity at the same time. Smooth stone, good balanced hybrid!â€
â€œHappy high. Very good herb.â€
â€œWell, I love The Truth. Leafly's discription fits it to a T".  If there are any wrestling fans out there

column3: â€œGreat for when you need to just chillllll ouuttttt after a stressful day. After a few bong rips, my body felt like it was made of a cloud. Overall, this strain gives you an intense body high that's coupled with a mood boost. Excellent and one of my favorites.â€

column3: â€œThis strain will set you free!! Just like its name. Tingly and sedative. Unique!â€

â€œVery beautiful vibrant flowers that are just absolutely loaded with kif. It had enough to cover an entire bowl from just 2 nugs.â€
â€œI love this strain is really fire.â€

â€œHard to find and very expensive if so, this strain for me has the distinction of providing instant, and COMPLETE stress reduction.
Has a very interesting taste and look as well, HIGHLY recommended if you can find it.â€
â€œThis strain for me was a great taste and made us very sleepy..â€

â€œgood budâ€
â€œAwesome!â€

â€œAwesome strain. Good for daytime use. I wouldn't say clear headed, but definitely able to function. Not the best tasting but I had basically no dry mouth or eyes. Go outside and enjoy the weather.â€
â€œNice, but knocked me out! Only knocks me out when I smoke it in a blunt. Put it in a bong or vape, you become confident and anxiety free.â€
â€œThis strain was nuts. Super heady and potent nuggets. Thoroughly enjoyed and would definitely purchase this strain again.â€
â€œspicy floral tastes and heavy thc development leaves you quicky feeling a spacy trippy kind of high more talkative and upliftedâ€

â€œRead directions on the package recommending 2 inhales to start. Glad I followed those directions. Two was like, a lot. It's clear that this strain is indica-dominant, but still a hybrid. Compared to the HH cold-filtered indicas, this one doesn't immediately Nyquil your ass to sleep. The taste is hard to pinpoint and honestly I forgot. It was fruity but not like... sweet? Kind of like lemon and cucumber spa water. Thi...â€

â€œHonestly one of my favorites out of everything Iâ€™ve had. For me it had this effect of the perfect mix of relaxation and productiveness. I felt energetic but not over the top and it would just fade gently over time, Iâ€™d never have some hard crash. Really great one for me. Would recommend.â€
â€œSpicy/Earthy is right but a caramelized,sweet, almost prune-molasses, like note is very dominant, even in the after taste. Amazing strain.â€

â€œIf you just want a good body relaxation the truth will do the job. It mellows you out as well as you could want a strain to. Thatâ€™s about all it did for me though. Wasnâ€™t much happier or uplifted, no head buzz, didnâ€™t even really get sleep, was just particularly mellowed out. Itâ€™s not the worst but iâ€™d rather a broader spectrum of effects.â€

â€œI think this strain very quickly became one of my top tens.  It has an incredible grape and berry flavor followed by a very stringent chemical diesel flavor and some woody notes follow. The high is great, it sets about your head and shoulders with that wonderful Buzzy tingly sativa high and qickly followed down the rest of your body relaxing all the tension and stress. Great as a joint or blunt, as well as through bi...â€
â€œCame across some truth brand head band and truth crossbreed very good  strain taste wondefulâ€
â€œBought a pre roll to try. Lemon and citrus taste. Gave my lips a tingly feel to them which I liked. Overall great flowerâ€
â€œEvery time Iâ€™ve had the Truth I get anxious on the comedown. Still a great strain though. Hits me fast.â€

â€œI used a HH vape (I think I need to qualify by review is not on the direct flower).  It was OK for pain.  I did experience some splintering of thought (more then others, I hate forgetting).  Maybe the flower has a better effect.â€
â€œMan I had a sneak a toke and one hit did the trick for like a couple hours and I smoke all day long if I can...good stuff 4 realâ€
â€œGood strain. Clear, yet powerfully calming. Good pain relief and a very easy high.â€

â€œNice and strong. I'm pretty lazy, but very relaxed and mellowed out. Need to get motivated...

No noticeable munchie cravings.
Nice flavor when smoking it, but the bud has a heavy road kill/dead skunk aroma.
Lots of thoughts, but nothing particularly creative or outstanding.â€

â€œI've tried this strain in the past and I LOVED it! I haven't smoked in close to a year so i'm looking for that special strain to get back to smoking for my anxiety issues. I'm d r definitely putting this strain in my top 5 narrowing down section.â€

â€œWell the truth of the matter is that this strain kicked my arse right to bed! Very nice experience after a gruelling couple of days. :) 
Got a cortisone and freezing shot in my knee two days before I smoked this bad boy. I felt so good I did a ton of stuff and overworked some of my other arthritic joints. Woke up stiff and in pain, stumbled through my day, and decided to try The Truth before bed. This hot babe cheris...â€
â€œPerfect strain to relax you after a long day. Pain relief and a sense of calmness and euphoria. Definitely going to be in my rotation for a while.â€

â€œTHIS WAS GREAT! took a vacation to seattle and got this from the stash box pot shop in ballard seattle. It was pretty good. but not much better than I get in south carolina for about the same price. but it was great.â€
